unnormalised: Hey, these mental health apps are quite something, eh? Been trying a few myself. Reminds me of my grandma always saying "chinta chadhi toh chita chadhi"! Hope they actually help and aren't just another fad. Anyone else using them? Maybe some good recommendations? I’m looking for something to help manage stress, especially around Diwali. Thinking of downloading "Inner Peace Now". Heard it’s good. Need to stay calm to make perfect biryani!
